document_data.name: Firedrinkers' Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Firedrinkers' Inn''' was an inn found in [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]]. This famous establishment had a pristine reputation among the traveling folk of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Services: Firedrinkers' was the finest and most expensive inn in Yhaunn. It was fitted with luxurious furnishings that made it a popular resting place for those who could afford the expenses, which was matched by fine dining either brought directly to a patron's room or served in the ground-level dining room accompanied by music and dance.
